title: Workflow Contract Schema
description: JSON Schema for Engram CI/CD workflow contract validation
_schema_versioning_policy: Schema field changes follow SemVer: Major = remove/rename required field or tighten constraint; Minor = add new optional field or new definition; Patch = update descriptions or add comment fields (^_). When adding new fields like step_name_aliases: 1) Add to schema first, 2) Update validate_workflows.py, 3) Update contract.md docs, 4) Bump contract version (Minor for new optional fields).
_comment_field_convention: Fields starting with underscore (^_) are comment/metadata fields ignored by validators. Use _changelog_vX.Y.Z for version changelogs, _note_* for inline documentation, _todo_* for pending items. Adding comment fields is always a Patch-level change.

$schema.description: Reference to this schema file (must be workflow_contract.v2.schema.json)

description.description: Human-readable description of the contract (10-500 characters)

last_updated.description: Last update date in YYYY-MM-DD format

frozen_step_text.description: Frozen step names that must match exactly

frozen_job_names.description: Frozen job names that must match exactly

step_name_aliases.description: Optional mapping of canonical step names to allowed aliases. When a required_step is not found, the validator checks if the actual step name is in the aliases list. If matched, reports WARNING instead of ERROR.

^_changelog_v[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+$.description: Changelog entry for a specific version (e.g., _changelog_v2.5.0). Version policy: Adding changelog fields is a Patch-level change. Format: brief description of changes in that version.

^_[a-z][a-z0-9_]*$.description: Internal comment or metadata field (must start with underscore followed by lowercase letter). Version policy: Adding/modifying comment fields is always a Patch-level change. Conventions: _note_* for documentation, _todo_* for pending items, _deprecated_* for deprecation notices. These fields are ignored by validators.

file.description: Path to the workflow file (must match .github/workflows/<name>.yml)

outputs.description: List of output names from change detection

labels.description: PR labels used by this workflow (lowercase with optional colon)

job_ids.description: List of job IDs in this workflow (lowercase kebab-case)

job_names.description: List of job display names (position-matched to job_ids)

required_jobs.description: Jobs that must exist with specific requirements

required_env_vars.description: Environment variables required at workflow level (UPPER_SNAKE_CASE)

artifact_archive.description: Artifact archive contract for this workflow

ci_workflow_definition.description: CI workflow definition with stricter requirements

labels.description: PR labels for CI workflow (e.g., openmemory:freeze-override)

nightly_workflow_definition.description: Nightly workflow definition with stricter requirements

required_env_vars.description: Environment variables required for nightly (must define at least one)

id.description: Job ID (must match jobs.<id> in workflow, lowercase kebab-case)

required_steps.description: List of required step names (must match workflow steps)

required_artifact_paths.description: Paths of required artifacts (deprecated: use artifact_archive.required_artifact_paths)

artifact_step_names.description: Names of steps that upload artifacts (deprecated: use artifact_archive.artifact_step_names)

required_artifact_paths.description: Required artifact paths (may include glob patterns)

artifact_step_names.description: Step names responsible for artifact uploads

^[A-Za-z0-9][A-Za-z0-9 _:\\-\\(\\)/\\.]+.description: Allowed aliases for a given canonical step name
